title: 1 bedroom 1 bath with 2 parking spaces in  Los Angeles
posting_body: Small Building with Controlled Access to Lobby and parking.
Large 1 bedroom 1 bath unit on the first floor with 2 parking spaces.
Spacious living with beautiful laminate floors throughout and sliding doors that lead to a large balcony.
Separate dining room with ceiling fan.
Lovely bright kitchen with a stove, dishwasher white counter tops and lots of storage.
l full bathroom off hallway with additional storage.
One Year Lease, good credit only need apply.
1 bedroom , 1 bath, 2 parking spaces, pool, laundry on site
You are welcome to take a drive by and check out the area.
If interested please call Brenda to schedule a time to see the inside.
Application fee of $40 to be submitted application only.
Small pet welcome with a pet deposit and pet license.
